title: A Gathering of Appearances
description: (New Cover Edition)When Faith LeBlanc, a privileged senator’s daughter, catches a criminal in the act of robbing her family’s New Orleans’ mansion, she intervenes with gun in hand. In the process, this intruder oddly inspires Faith and an alliance develops between the pair as they struggle with uncertainties while surrounded by questionable personalities.	Voodoo mystique, a go-fast boat trip across the Gulf of Mexico, a unique bond entice and stimulate this world-weary duo and they soon find they are unable to return to the lives they knew. In the end, they receive more than they bargained for in this page-turning novel with a plot filled with twists and turns leading to a gratifying ending.
author: Dana Thomas Weber
